react-components.PasswordStrengthIndicat: Capitalize some, but not all letters.
Add more words that are less common.
Avoid years that are associated with you.
Capitalize more than the first letter.
This is a commonly used password.
Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
Dates are easy to guess.
Repeated character patterns like "abcabcabc" are easy to guess.
Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
Avoid predictable letter substitutions like '@' for 'a'.
Use longer keyboard patterns and change typing direction multiple times.
The password must be at least 8 characters
Single names or surnames are easy to guess.
You can create strong passwords without using symbols, numbers, or uppercase letters.
If you use this password elsewhere, you should change it.
Recent years are easy to guess.
Avoid repeated words and characters.
A password is required
Avoid reversed spellings of common words.
Common character sequences like "abc" are easy to guess.
This is similar to a commonly used password.
Repeated characters like "aaa" are easy to guess.
Straight rows of keys on your keyboard are easy to guess.
This is a frequently used password.
This is a heavily used password.
Use multiple words, but avoid common phrases.
There should not be any personal data.
Single words are easy to guess.

server.emails.appMemberEmailChange.body:
{name, select, null {Hello,} other {Hello {name},}}

You have changed your email address for {appName}. Before you can use your account, we need to verify your email address.

Please click <link>here</link> to verify your email address.

Kind regards

, _{appName}_
server.emails.resend.body:
{name, select, null {Hello,} other {Hello {name},}}

Someone has requested to resend the verification key for your account. Before you can use your account, we need to verify your email address.

Please click <link>this link</link> to vervify your email address.

**Didn’t request this email?**

No worries! Your address may have been entered by mistake. If you ignore or delete this email, nothing will happen to your account.

Kind regards,

_{appName}_
server.emails.resend.subject: Confirm account registration
server.emails.reset.body:
{name, select, null {Hello,} other {Hello {name},}}

A password reset has been requested for your account. Please click <link>here</link> to reset your password.

**Didn’t request this email?**

Your email address may have been entered by mistake. This email can be ignored safely.

Kind regards,

_{appName}_
server.emails.reset.subject: Password reset
server.emails.welcome.body:
{name, select, null {Hello,} other {Hello {name},}}

Thank you for registering your account. Before you can use your account, we need to verify your email address.

Please click <link>here</link> to verify your email address.

Kind regards,

_{appName}_
server.emails.welcome.subject: Welcome to {appName}
